news: The STEM building is now open! Check out our brand new spaces, shops, and study areas!
Makerspace 3D printing, laser cutting, and embroidery workshops are now available at www.makerepo.com
Want to join a team? Apply to one of our engineering teams at JMTC.
Got a project idea and want recognition? Design Day Fall 2018 is coming up at the end of the semester, so start building!
